title: sharaNam enavE
sahitya:
sharaNam enavE paNivAi manamE sharavaNabhavanadu tiruvaDi tanil nI


anupallavi

  karuNai koNDu tannai kaNDu vaNanginOrai aravaNaittu aruL purind-AtkoLvOnai


caraNam    praNava mantrattin poruLai uNarndiDAda brahman koNDirunda iru mApparindavanai
sirai vAsappaDutti shiva perumAnukku adanai guru pOl upadEsham purindu sirandOnai
